title: Toys 'R' Us will likely shut all U.S. stores
text:
Toys 'R' Us will likely shut all U.S. stores Wednesday, March 14, 2018 - 00:50 
The iconic store chain, Toys 'R' Us, will sell or close all of its U.S. stores in the coming months, which could affect up to 33,000 jobs and more than 700 U.S. locations.   
The iconic store chain, Toys 'R' Us, will sell or close all of its U.S. stores in the coming months, which could affect up to 33,000 jobs and more than 700 U.S. locations.  //reut.rs/2peDAh2
